recommendedApps.name: ChatBI with Sales Analysis Expert
recommendedApps.title: Sales Analysis Expert
recommendedApps.description: I am an experienced sales data analysis expert who is good at optimizing sales strategies and driving business growth through data insights. I am familiar with a variety of data analysis tools and methods, can quickly identify market trends and customer needs, and provide companies with efficient and accurate sales solutions.

recommendedApps.name: OpenAI Tasks
recommendedApps.title: Replicate OpenAI tasks
recommendedApps.description: I implemented the equivalent functionality of the OpenAI tasks and can freely configure the agent structure.

af7133cb-32b3-47ff-90c1-b144c4d4887e.export_data:
team:
  name: ChatBI with Sales Analysis Expert
  type: agent
  title: 销售分析专家
  description: 我是一名经验丰富的销售数据分析专家，擅长通过数据洞察优化销售策略，推动业务增长。熟悉多种数据分析工具和方法，能够快速识别市场趋势和客户需求，为企业提供高效、精准的销售解决方案。
  avatar:
    emoji:
      id: blush
      set: 
            unified: 1F60A
    background: rgba(213, 245, 246, 0.8)
    url: null
  starters:
    - null
    - null
    - null
    - null
  options:
    position:
      x: 306
      y: 314.75
    scale: 1
    agent:
      Agent_qVd35XsFv3:
        position:
          x: 10
          y: 22
    toolset:
      74a572c9-c9ab-4171-850f-791f232efaa7:
        position:
          x: 367
          y: 10
  agentConfig: null
  memory: null
  summarize: null
  version: 
  agent:
    key: Agent_qVd35XsFv3
    name: null
    title: 销售分析
    description: 熟悉多种数据分析工具和方法，能够快速识别市场趋势和客户需求，为企业提供高效、精准的销售解决方案
    avatar:
      emoji:
        id: blush
        set: 
               unified: 1F60A
      background: rgba(213, 245, 246, 0.8)
      url: null
    prompt: >+
      你是一名销售分析业务专家，请使用工具回复用户问题。如果还没有模型的维度和度量等信息请先使用 `get_cube_context`
      获取，然后根据这些信息继续。


      使用工具 `answer_question` 回复给用户分析结果，其中 parameter timeSlicers ranges 的使用方式如下：

      <input>去年</input>

      <output>

      lookBack: 1

      lookAhead: -1

      </output>


      <input>今年</input>

      <output>

      lookBack: 0

      lookAhead: 0

      </output>


      <input>明年</input>

      <output>

      lookBack: -1

      lookAhead: 1

      </output>


      <input>去年到今年</input>

      <output>

      lookBack: 1

      lookAhead: 0

      </output>


      当用户明确要展示某些指标 Indicators 时才调用 `show_indicators` 来展示指标数据，尽量不要调用工具。


      如果 Cube context 没有能满足要求的 measure 或者 indicators 请先调用 create_indicator 创建一个
      indicator，然后再用此指标回答问题答案。


      mdx query statement 的语法有以下限制：

      1. 同一个 dimension 不能同时出现在 columns rows slicers 任意两个 axis 上，如果需要限制 columns
      或者 rows 上 dimension members 时可以用 descendants 等 function。


      最后不用生成图片，数据图形已经在工具中展示给了用户。


      当前可用 Cubes 有以下：

      <cubes>

      {{chatbi_models}}

      </cubes>
    parameters: null
    options: null
    copilotModel: null
    leaderKey: null
    collaboratorNames: []
    toolsetIds:
      - 74a572c9-c9ab-4171-850f-791f232efaa7
    knowledgebaseIds: []

fb8c4d01-3a40-4a84-95ca-030ec22b935a.export_data:
team:
  name: OpenAI Tasks
  type: agent
  title: Replicate OpenAI tasks
  description: I implemented the equivalent functionality of the OpenAI tasks and can freely configure the agent structure.
  avatar:
    emoji:
      id: clock7
    background: rgba(239, 241, 245, 0.8)
  starters:
    - Schedule a task to be executed every minute. Tell me a joke and send it to Lark
    - Schedule a scheduled task every morning to check the latest stock quotes and send them to email
    - null
    - null
  options:
    position:
      x: 259.53079455437864
      y: 68.52239435692718
    scale: 0.6999999999999997
    agent:
      Agent_VvWnFr9uyk:
        position:
          x: 80.76927877837612
          y: 133.85719761169094
      Agent_R7rrxo4BBT:
        position:
          x: -222.08791208791214
          y: 373.3471366098352
      Agent_kbfMLLShF0:
        position:
          x: 395.16773089292496
          y: 369.84714182259296
    toolset:
      91fe32da-6385-4aa6-bfa3-41dc59edc1df:
        position:
          x: 578.0248140328096
          y: 97.10718623011107
      8402879f-6a98-4c43-b6af-7d8279182ef6:
        position:
          x: 1.0651676140472546
          y: 597.6181194422356
      bffefaee-4bfd-4d91-af5e-cba902af1d5e:
        position:
          x: 670.0684353894803
          y: 615.1180880244859
      5c0cc617-0889-43c6-a6fd-916c9546f927:
        position:
          x: 338.024778400266
          y: 606.3680794283152
  agentConfig:
    endNodes:
      - send_mail
      - send_mail_batch
      - feishu_create_message
  memory: null
  summarize: null
  version: "1"
  agent:
    key: Agent_VvWnFr9uyk
    name: null
    title: Tasks Manager
    description: Helps you manage scheduled tasks
    avatar: null
    prompt: >-
      Use the `*_task` tool to schedule **tasks** to do later. They could
      include reminders, daily news summaries, and scheduled searches — or even
      conditional tasks, where you regularly check something for the user.

      Set `agentKey` parameter to 'task-to-email' or 'task-to-feishu'.

      - `task-to-email` can send email.

      - `task-to-feishu` can send feishu message.


      To create a task, provide a **name** **prompt** and **schedule**

      **name** should be short, imperative, and start with a verb. DO NOT
      include the date or time requested.


      **prompt** should be a summary of the user's request but DO NOT include
      any time scheduling info.
          - For simple reminders, use "Tell me to..."
          - For requests that require a search, use "Search for..."
          - For conditional requests, include something like "...and notify me if so."

      **schedule** must be given in cron job format.
          - If the user does not specify a time, make a best guess.
          - Prefer the RRULE: property whenever possible.
          - DO NOT specify SUMMARY and DO NOT specify DTEND properties in the VEVENT.
          - For conditional tasks, choose a sensible frequency for your recurring schedule. (Weekly is usually good, but for time-sensitive things use a more frequent schedule.)

      If you want to delete a task, please first query the task list and select
      the task to delete.
    parameters: null
    options: null
    copilotModel: null
    leaderKey: null
    collaboratorNames: []
    toolsetIds:
      - 91fe32da-6385-4aa6-bfa3-41dc59edc1df
    knowledgebaseIds: []
  copilotModel:
    modelType: llm
    model: gpt-4o
    options: null
  knowledgebases: []
  toolsets:
    - id: 91fe32da-6385-4aa6-bfa3-41dc59edc1df
      name: Scheduled tasks
      type: task
      category: builtin
      description: Manage scheduled tasks
      avatar:
        url: //api.mtda.cloud/api/xpert-toolset/builtin-provider/task/icon
      options:
        toolPositions:
          create_task: 0
          list_task: 1
          delete_task: 2
      privacyPolicy: null
      customDisclaimer: null
      tags: []
      tools:
        - id: 32791ca3-4a9c-4cd7-876a-d6e137a1cda5
          name: create_task
          description: null
          avatar: null
          enabled: true
